sentence: A dissent written by Republican Justices Sharon Kennedy and Patrick DeWine—the son of GOP Governor Mike DeWine—complained that "four members of this court have now commandeered the redistricting process and that they will continue to reject any General Assembly-district plan until they get the plan they want."
author: Aila Slisco
title: Republicans' Revised Legislative Maps Struck Down by Ohio Supreme Court

author: Anna Staver
title: Ohio Supreme Court postpones contempt hearing with Gov. DeWine, secretary of state, others

author: Via AP news wire
title: Ohio’s high court nixes 3rd set of GOP-drawn Statehouse maps

author: Haley BeMiller
title: Secretary of State Frank LaRose says legislative races won't make May 3rd primary

title: Ohio Republicans Would Rather Impeach a Judge than Stop Cheating at Elections

title: In Ohio's redistricting battle, Gov. Mike DeWine said he'd take the lead. But did he?
